songs.title: Pei Pa Koa
songs.lyrics:
This is my pei pa koa drink
And all is for me...
I have my time here, and all is for you
Your lips tan cerca de mi
Y eso es para mi... honey!

Every day, every time is for you
Every time, every day is for, every day is for you
Every time, every day is for you

Every night
Pei pa koa for me
Pei pa koa for

This is my pei pa koa drink, and all is for me
This is my best, best "ollie", and all is for you
Your lips tan cerca de mi y eso es para mi honey

Every day, every time is for you

Every time, every day is for, every day is for you
Every time, every day is for you

Every night
Pei pa koa for me
Pei pa koa for us
